---
title: "Real Estate Billionaires"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
```

```{r}
data_raw <- googlesheets4::read_sheet('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ICjbS8SRTXU4VpcypX9Owot3RtCkByDu3sNh0n8Q6-o/edit#gid=0')
data_raw
```

```{r}

data_raw |> 
    group_by(Gender) |> 
    summarise(Count = n()) |> 
    arrange(Count |> desc())
```

```{r}

data_raw |> 
    group_by(Religion) |> 
    summarise(Count = n()) |> 
    arrange(Count |> desc())
```

```{r}

data_raw |> 
    group_by(Race) |> 
    summarise(Count = n()) |> 
    arrange(Count |> desc())
```

```{r}

data_raw |> 
    group_by(`Education Level`) |> 
    summarise(Count = n()) |> 
    arrange(Count |> desc())
```
